mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST (POSTNUM, PLATFORMNUM, ID, POSTDATE, POSTDATA) VALUES (post_seq.nextVal, #{platformNum}, #{id}, SYSDATE,#{content})
mapper.select: SELECT A.POSTNUM ,A.PLATFORMNUM ,A.ID ,A.POSTDATE ,A.POSTDATA ,NVL(B.SHARENUM,0) || '/4' AS SHARENUM FROM POST A INNER JOIN OTT_SERVICE B ON A.PLATFORMNUM = B.PLATFORMNUM
